Text.Language: Ten]ho ouoh tentwbh n~tekmeta~gayoc pimairwmi m~per]sipi nan qen pisipi n~e~neh: oude m~perhitten e~bol qa neke~biaik.
We ask and entreat Your goodness, O Lover of Mankind, put us not to shame in the everlasting shame nor cast us away, we Your servants.
نسألُ ونطلبُ من صلاحِكَ يا محبَّ البشرِ، لا تُخزِنا بالخِزيِ الأبديِ، ولا تطرحْنا نحن عبيدَكَ.
Mperberbwrten e~bolha pekho: oude m~perjoc nan je ]cwoun m~mwten an.
Drive us not away from Your face, neither say to us, “I know you not.”
ولا تصرِفْنا عن وجهِكَ، ولا تقلْ لنا: ”إنني لستُ أَعرِفُكُم.“
Alla moi n~oumwou n~nena~v/oui~: nem hanmoumi n~erm/ n~nenbal: hopwc n~tenrimi m~pie~hoou nem pie~jwrh m~pekm~yo e~h~r/i e~jen nenparaptwma.
But rather give water for our heads and fountains of tears for our eyes that we may weep day and night before You on account of our transgressions.
بل أَعطِ ماءً لرؤوسِنا، وينابيعَ دموعٍ لأعينِنا، لكي نبكيَ نهاراً وليلاً أمامَكَ على زلاتِنا.
Je a~non pe peklaoc nem nie~cwou n~te peko~hi: cini n~nenanomia~: aricun,wrin n~nenparaptwma.
For we are Your people and the sheep of Your flock; pass by our iniquities and forgive our transgressions,
لأننا نحنُ شعبُكَ وخرافُ قطيعِكَ. تجاوَزْ عن آثامِنا، واصفحْ عن زلاتِنا.
N/e~tanaitou qen penouws: nem n/e~tanaitou qen penouws an: n/e~tanaitou qen oue~mi: nem n/e~tanaitou qen oumetate~mi: n/eth/p nem n/eyouwnh e~bol.
which we have committed willingly and which we have committed unwillingly, which we have committed knowingly and which we have committed unknowingly, the hidden and the manifest,
التي صنعناها بمشيئَتِنا والتي صنعناها بغيرِ مشيئَتِنا، التي صنعناها بمعرفةٍ والتي صنعناها بغيرِ معرفةٍ، الخفيةِ والظاهرةِ.
N/e~tauersorp n~ouonhou e~bol nem n/etanwbs e~rwou: nai e~tefcwoun m~mwou n~je pekran eyouab.
those which were formerly confessed, and those which we have forgotten—these which are known before Your holy name.
التي سَبَقَ إظهارها والتي نسيناها، هذه هي التي يعرفُها اسمُكَ القدوسُ.
Cwtem P[oic e~p~twbh n~te peklaoc: mah~y/k e~p~fiahom n~te neke~biaik.
Hearken, O Lord, to the prayer of Your people, and be mindful of the groaning of Your servants.
اسمع ياربُّ طلبةَ شعبِكَ، والتفِتْ إلي تنهُّدِ عبيدِكَ.
Ouoh eybe nanobi noui~ nem nicwf n~te pah/t: m~perfej peklaoc m~p~jini~ e~q~r/i n~te Pekp~neuma eyouab.
Because of my own sins and the abominations of my heart, deprive not Your people of the coming down of Your Holy Spirit.
ومن أجلِ خطاياي خاصةً ونجاساتِ قلبي لا تحرمْ شعبَكَ من حلولِ روحِكَ القدوسِ.
